original_title: Brian May - Live at the Brixton Academy
overview: 1994 UK 15-track PAL video recorded live in London on 15th June 1993.  Tracks: 1 Back To The Light  2 Driven By You  3 Tie Your Mother Down  4 Love Token  5 Headlong  6 Love Of My Life  7 39 / Let Your Heart Rule Your Head  8 Too Much Love Will Kill You  9 Since You've Been Gone  10 Now I'm Here  11 Guitar Extravagance  12 Resurrection  13 Last Horizon  14 We Will Rock You  15 Hammer To Fall
title: Brian May - Live at the Brixton Academy
